description:
Cherry makes every shoot a challenge for both her and anyone tying her up. She has been in almost every bondage position and rigged by the best in the biz, so The Pope takes it to the next level. every scene, Cherry is in a partial or a full suspension.
Suspensions are some of the toughest bondage to endure. The method behind basic suspensions, are slow and agonizing torment. The initial discomfort turns into grueling pain; pushing some to madness. We didn't keep her in the tie long enough for that to happen, but her suffering is very evident from the time she does spend.
title: Cherry Torn - Suspended Suffering
